remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的对象 `trusts` 将追加到集合的末尾。The objects contained in `trusts` are appended to the end of the collection. 你可以使用 方法快速地将应用程序信任对象的另一个集合添加到集合，而不是使用方法将每个应用程序信任手动添加到集合中 。You can use the method to quickly add another collection of application trust objects to the collection instead of manually adding each application trust to the collection using the method. 若要删除之前添加的应用程序信任范围，请使用 方法。To remove a range of application trusts that you previously added, use the method.

span.span: An that can be used to iterate over the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现允许在 集合中移动的接口。The implements the interface that allows you to move within a collection. 使用 属性可获取集合中当前指向的项。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用 方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用 方法可将枚举器移动到其初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to its initial position. > [!NOTE] > 创建枚举器后，或使用方法将 枚举器重新定位到集合的开头，则必须调用 方法以将枚举数定位到第一项。After you create the enumerator, or use the method to reposition the enumerator to the start of the collection, you must then call the method to position the enumerator to the first item. 否则，由属性表示的项 是不确定的。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查集合中每个对象的属性是否有 与参数指定的应用程序匹配的属性值 `appFullName` 。The property of each object in the collection is examined for a property value that matches the application specified by the `appFullName` parameter.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的应用程序信任。

span.span: Removes the specified application trust from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索整个集合，并删除指定应用程序信任的所有实例。The entire collection is searched, and all instances of the specified application trust are removed. 删除的对象之后的对象将上移以占据空出的位置。The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions. 还会更新移动的对象的索引。The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.

span.span: The of the object to be removed.

summary.span: 从集合中移除与指定条件匹配的所有应用程序信任对象。

span.span: Removes all application trust objects that match the specified criteria from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序信任可以通过精确的版本匹配进行标识，具体取决于参数的值 `versionMatch` 。The application trust can be identified by an exact version match, dependent upon the value of the `versionMatch` parameter. 方法用于查找所有匹配的应用程序信任，并从集合中移除匹配项。The method is used to locate all matching application trusts, and the matching items are removed from the collection. 删除的对象之后的对象将上移以占据空出的位置。The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions. 还会更新移动的对象的索引。The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.

summary.span: 从集合中移除应用程序信任对象的集合。

span.span: Removes a collection of application trust objects from the collection.
